review: This is a definite contender for the Roku 3. The ability to handle games is a big plus. I recommend getting the gaming controller to go with this if you plan on playing many games.I only have a few minor issues that I wish Amazon would consider. I would prefer the option to power this off when I'm not using it so it's not always on. I understand that it's easier to update apps and firmware and all that if it's always on, but I would like the option to power it off when I'm not using it.The other issue I have, and I've only had it happen once, is the screen is completely black, and it would not respond when I pressed any buttons on the remote to wake it up. I had to unplug it and plug it back in.Again, I've only had this issue one time, so maybe it was a one time thing. Overall, this is a great streaming device and for now it has taken the place of my Roku 3.
